skills.name: Java
skills.description: Java is the first programming language I learned and taught myself, as such I have been using it to many capacities including professionally since 2010.

skills.name: Python

skills.name: C++
skills.description: C++ was the language I used to learn data structures and algorithms during my undergraduate study. I have used this for several projects during those years in undergraduate study.

jobs.name: aWhere Inc
descriptions: Full-stack Software Engineer with ASP.NET backend and Vue.js frontend.
Maintained numerous ASP.NET and .NET Framework microservices and large SQL server distributed systems.
Created a developer dashboard and login SSO framework for proprietary API access.
Data validation and routine CI/CD tasks automated in Python and Ruby.
Manage TeamCity CI/CD Pipeline and monitor daily builds.

jobs.name: PDI Technologies
descriptions: Develop and maintain software in .NET and Angular.
Agile workflow with sprints and scrum meetings.
Support high risk and escalated engineer-related support cases.
Provide on-call assistance to support teams.
Maintain large SQL Server databases with thousands of stored procedures.

jobs.name: Q2
descriptions: Triaged support cases and communicated with customer status on their cases.
Discovered and resolved bugs in large Java monolithic architecture.
Met with customers to resolve technical issues.

jobs.name: University of Mary Hardin-Baylor

jobs.name: Baylor University
